reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little bag for the price
reviews.reviewText: Had a freak slip & fall walking my dog that ended with me breaking my pelvis in 3 places & my left arm at the same time😬. Ended up in a wheelchair for a bit, then needed a walker & eventually a cane. Needed a cross body purse b/c the left arm was useless for weight bearing of any sort & still needed to get around but was unable to carry anything while using the Walker or the cane. It is a nice, medium weight nylon which would have been reasonably water resistant if I had needed it to be. I felt it was a good size for my needs-It has 2 really nice hidden/secure pockets if someone needed it for travel purposes (one inside the large compartment & one zippered one on the backside of the large compartment that is next to the abdomen), the other front pockets held keys, mints, chapstick w/a little room to spare, a woman’s wallet fit nicely in the main pocket. The zippers are nice & sturdy. I did have a seam come loose but it was easily repaired. Not sure how well it would hold up to everyday hard use but for my purpose or a modest sized day/trip travel purse it was a reasonably priced bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My picky teen loves this satchel
reviews.reviewText: This crossbody satchel is a hit with my teen daughter! The trendy design and practicality make it her favorite accessory. It's spacious enough for essentials, and the adjustable strap adds versatility. The quality is superb, and it effortlessly combines style with functionality. A must-have for fashion-conscious teens—highly recommend this chic and practical crossbody satchel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not durable for long
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and I love the size but it did tear at the inside zipper pocket within 1 month of owning. Cheap enough that you can buy a couple though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was worried this would be too big or too small and not look right like so many other sling bags I've tried. This crossbody bag didn't disappoint! I love it! Just the right size and has an adjustable strap. Plenty of room inside and has an outer zipper pocket. Nice white cream color (not a yellow based cream). Very trendy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lots of room but cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: Had this bag almost 4 months now.Pros:Very roomy.Lots of pocketsFits my full size wallet + lots moreComfortable to wearGoes with everything you wearCons:Cheaply madeStrap is a rope like material that irritates your neck after a bit of wearingHave to constantly adjust the straps. As you wear it adjustments starts sliding & extends itAs seen in the pics provided the inside seams on 2 of the large pockets have started coming apart. Makes zipping hard & is frustrating to deal with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little bag is perfect for travel and the airport. Holds a lot of stuff and is super functional and light weight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute with tons of separate zipper compartments
reviews.reviewText: The bag is just as I expected, and I think the dimensions stated are probably highly accurate. Based on the photos (which I realized I might have misjudged) I expected it to be a little larger, but I knew from the dimensions that it was not. There are cute zipper pulls with stars on them, and many separate zipper compartments. There is a perfect convenient snap compartment on the front for your keys. It will fit one water bottle in the largest compartment, as long as it's not too big, but probably not two unless they were pretty small, and at that point, not much else is going to fit. (I wanted this for the gym.) There is a ventilation hole at the upper back of the bag I chose (black). Full disclosure, I haven't used it at all yet. My only disappointment is that it was shipped in what seemed to be the bag the item was packed in from the manufacturer - not a box, not a bag mailer. The bag was flimsy and could have easily been damaged in shipping, resulting in damage to the item (like another item I recently received was). The bag was transparent, you could see what it was. If you're ordering this as a gift and you want it to be a surprise, just be aware that it might not be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Purse Size
reviews.reviewText: Cute bag, good small size. Lots of pockets and sections for different things. The zippers work well. However, the strap broke off after only a few uses. I used a zip-tie to make it last a little longer, a few months, but was definitely disappointed that it didn't last and broke so quickly. I put stuff in each pocket, would not say I overstuffed it, as all of the zippers easily closed.
Excelente tamaño, muy cómodo para llevar de paseo

reviews.reviewTitle: Color not as appears in photos
reviews.reviewText: Size good, sections, good. Thought was rose/pink but turned out to be mauve
Very versatile, can be used as a crossbody or backpack.Lots of room and nice material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: took this away for my holiday abroad, brilliant bag very comfy, great size pockets. BUT the colouring came out and ruined my best white top i was wearing, so wouldnt reccomend.
